Module com.dlsc.gemsfx
Package com.dlsc.gemsfx

Class EnhancedLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.control.Control
            • javafx.scene.control.Labeled
              • javafx.scene.control.Label
                • com.dlsc.gemsfx.EnhancedLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
    public class EnhancedLabel
extends javafx.scene.control.Label
    An enhanced label that allows for selecting the (whole) label and copying to the clipboard either via keyboard shortcut or via context menu.

    • Field Summary

      • getCopyContentSupplier

        public final Supplier<String> getCopyContentSupplier()

      • copyContentSupplierProperty

        public final javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<Supplier<String>> copyContentSupplierProperty()
        Stores the supplier used for filling the clipboard when the user copies the label. Sometimes applications want to copy only a part of the label, e.g. an ID shown by the label like this: "Customer account #12345678". The copy content supplier can then decide to just return the ID "12345678" instead of the whole string. The default supplier however returns the whole string.
        Returns:
        the supplier for the clipboard content when the user copies the label

      • setCopyContentSupplier

        public final void setCopyContentSupplier​(Supplier<String> copyContentSupplier)
